TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SKGlyphPathDelegate(SKPath path, SKMatrix matrix);
.class public auto ansi sealed SKGlyphPathDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The path of the glyph, or if the glyph has no path.
The transformation matrix to position the glyph.
Docs.summary: Represents a callback method that receives the path and transformation matrix for each glyph when enumerating glyph paths.
